turkish_example_sentence: O bu eski hikayeyi bilmediğinde, çok merak etti.
english_example_sentence: When he/she didn't know this old story, he/she was very curious.
russian_example_sentence: Когда он/она не знал/а эту старую историю, он/она очень любопытствовал/а.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O bu eski hikayeyi ______, çok merak etti.
